name: RoyalJelly
description:
Through the magic of evolution, you evolved from a square jelly to a humanoid jelly!

Now the other jellies want to eat you, taking away your new powers!
Fight your way up the food-chain by hitting the other blobs until they they are small enough to be absorbed (They change color).
Step on them to absorb them and grow in size! You are now ready to face the bigger jellies.
Destroy all jellies to save yourself and control your world...

This game is best played with a controller (Tested with xbox one controller)

Controls:

Arrows/left joystick to move

Mouse/right joystick to look around

left click / A on controller to attack

Technical information

All game assets have been made using TiltBrush on the HTC Vive.

The only assets that have been reused are animations for the main character from the standard assets.
